description: Updates a file system association. This operation is only supported in the FSx File Gateways.

parameters.name: FileSystemAssociationARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file system association that you want to update.

parameters.name: CacheAttributes
parameters.description: The refresh cache information for the file share or FSx file systems. CacheStaleTimeoutInSeconds (integer) --- Refreshes a file share's cache by using Time To Live (TTL). TTL is the length of time since the last refresh after which access to the directory would cause the file gateway to first refresh that directory's contents from the Amazon S3 bucket or Amazon FSx file system. The TTL duration is in seconds. Valid Values:0, 300 to 2,592,000 seconds (5 minutes to 30 days)

nested_params.name: CacheStaleTimeoutInSeconds
nested_params.description: Refreshes a file share's cache by using Time To Live (TTL). TTL is the length of time since the last refresh after which access to the directory would cause the file gateway to first refresh that directory's contents from the Amazon S3 bucket or Amazon FSx file system. The TTL duration is in seconds. Valid Values:0, 300 to 2,592,000 seconds (5 minutes to 30 days)

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the updated file system association.
